law.catch_line: The Board may reinstate the license of an individual whose license has been suspended or revoked und...
law.text:
The Board may reinstate the license of an individual whose license has been suspended or revoked under § 5-314 of this subtitle if the individual:
applies to the Board for reinstatement of the license; and
provides to the Board adequate evidence that the applicant is qualified to have the license reinstated.
